synopsis: Ed and Al seek out an alchemist named Judeau after hearing rumors that he successfully completed a human transmutation. The Elrics find him in the service of a wealthy household and quickly become tangled in a web of family secrets and disturbing lies.

Winry and Hawkeye couldn't be more different. One is a bright-eyed youth, the other a hardened soldier. Still, common ground exists - in a world full of pain, both take the time to appreciate the little things in life that make them who they are.

18 year-old Izumi travels north to ask a famous alchemist, Silver Steiner, if she can study as his apprentice. The crotchety old man is willing to give her a shot - if she can survive for one month in the hostile wilds of the Briggs mountain range.

title.jp: Sore mo mata Kare no Senjou

synopsis: Before they were best friends and officers, Roy Mustang and Maes Hughes were military school rivals. When they finally settled their differences, they swore to never compromise their ideals. Unfortunately, ideals are often the first casualties of war.
